thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 21 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-CLIQ Digital: Concludes Acquisition Of Majority Stake In French AffiMobiz

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-CLIQ Digital: Concludes Acquisition Of Majority Stake In French AffiMobiz
text:
Feb 21 (Reuters) - CLIQ Digital AG:
* DGAP-NEWS: CLIQ DIGITAL AGâ€˜S SUBSIDIARY GRUMBL MEDIA CONCLUDES ACQUISITION OF MAJORITY STAKE IN FRENCH MEDIA PURCHASING SPECIALIST AFFIMOBIZ
* MAJORITY STAKE OF 80% IN AFFIMOBIZ EFFECTIVE 1 JANUARY 2018
* STAKE IN SUBSIDIARY CMIND B.V. INCREASED TO 80% * PARTIES HAVE AGREED NOT TO DISCLOSE PURCHASE PRICE * PURCHASE PRICE IS FINANCED FROM CASH FLOW OF CLIQ DIGITAL AG Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
